item.title: Indiana Jones Gameplay Deep Dive Released
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/indiana-jones-gameplay-deep-dive-released/

Bethesda and Microsoft have released a nearly 15-minute deep dive into the gameplay of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.

“From locations and puzzles to gear and combat, MachineGames Audio Director, Pete Ward, takes us on a whirlwind journey through the world of The Great Circle,” the video description reads. “Get ready for launch with this look at Indy’s grand adventure.”

The deep dive gives players a look at an entire section of the game, including cutscenes, puzzles, and Indy’s classic whip in action. Players also get a look at “Adventure Points” which are earned and used to unlock skills as you progress through the game.

One specific puzzle in the gameplay involves Indy pouring out wine to reveal a hidden number.

Check out the full Indiana Jones and the Great Circle gameplay deep dive for yourself, and let us know your thoughts down below or in the official Insider Gaming forums.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle launches on December 9 for Xbox Series X|S, PC, and Game Pass. The game will also be released on PlayStation 5 in spring 2025. The current rumors suggest an April 2025 release for the game on Sony’s platform.
